introduction.title: Where Craftsmanship Commands Presence
introduction.content: Aurelia Tradisia presents a focused selection of Indian sculptures that embody material excellence and refined artistic expression. Our collection spans traditional mastery and contemporary form, offering pieces that elevate residences, hospitality spaces, and executive environments. Every sculpture is carefully evaluated for finish quality, structural balance, and aesthetic presence.
introduction.alt: Luxury interior featuring curated Indian sculptures

features.title: Defined by Precision and Presence
features.description: Every sculpture in our collection is selected to meet the expectations of serious collectors and premium interior projects.

items.title: Selective Acquisition
items.description: Each sculpture is individually assessed for craftsmanship quality, material authenticity, and visual proportion before inclusion.

items.title: Material    Integrity
items.description: We work with enduring materials including solid wood, bronze, brass, and marble to ensure lasting structural and visual value.

items.title: Placement-Focused Approach
items.description: Our collection is chosen with real interior environments in mind, helping designers and collectors achieve strong spatial impact.

exclusivity.title: Private Access
exclusivity.description: Aurelia Tradisia operates through a focused, consultation-led approach. Our collection is shared selectively to maintain quality engagement with collectors, designers, and institutional buyers.
exclusivity.note: Contact us to receive the latest available pieces and design concepts.

hero.description: Aurelia Tradisia was established to present exceptional Indian sculptures to collectors, designers, and premium interior projects. Founded by Jyotirmoy Barman, the initiative focuses on identifying works that demonstrate strong craftsmanship, material integrity, and lasting visual presence. Our objective is straightforward: make high-quality Indian sculptural art accessible to serious buyers while maintaining rigorous selection standards.

founder.name: Jyotirmoy Barman
founder.title: Founder
founder.description: Jyotirmoy Barman founded Aurelia Tradisia after closely observing the depth of skill present among Indian sculptors and the limited structured access many high-quality works had to premium buyers. With a detail-oriented approach, he focuses on evaluating finish quality, proportion, material strength, and overall spatial impact before a piece is considered suitable for presentation through Aurelia Tradisia.
founder.alt: Jyotirmoy Barman, founder of Aurelia Tradisia

mission.title: Why Aurelia Tradisia Exists
mission.description: India produces a wide range of sculptural work across traditional and contemporary styles. However, buyers often face inconsistency in quality, finishing standards, and presentation. Aurelia Tradisia was created to introduce a more disciplined selection layer, helping serious collectors and designers access pieces that meet higher visual and material expectations.
mission.alt: Indian sculptor working on a detailed sculpture

mission.title: Our Selection Process
mission.description: Each sculpture is reviewed for craftsmanship precision, surface finish, structural balance, and material authenticity. We prioritize pieces that demonstrate strong presence in real interior environments, whether residential, hospitality, or executive spaces.
mission.alt: Carefully evaluated collection of Indian sculptures

mission.title: Our Ongoing Focus
mission.description: Aurelia Tradisia continues to refine its collection with an emphasis on quality, spatial relevance, and long-term durability. We aim to support informed acquisition decisions by presenting sculptures that perform well both artistically and within designed environments.
mission.alt: Close inspection of sculpture craftsmanship and finish
